title: Modernism Gone Wild
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
description: On a black background on black and white photographic reproduction of the Typographie poster, designed by Friedman in 1970, placed above a color image of an interior of Friedman's apartment in 1985. At upper left a yellow arrow points to a block of white text. At right center a small block of white text. At lower left, biographical information about the artist. At the bottom of the sheet at center in gray AIGA/Boston, followed by 12.5.80 in yellow. Upper center right, also in gray: 'Dan Friedman:' followed by 'Modernism Gone Wild' in yellow.
name: Poster
